mapper.insert: insert into GSS_FC (ID, SECTION_ID, SECTION_NAME, MONITOR_TIME, MEASURE_LINE, PRESSURE, WATER_DEPTH, WATER_TEMPER, DO_INSTRUMENT, DO_CONTENT, DN_CONTENT, DO_SATURATION, DN_SATURATION, DO1, DO2, DO3, TITRATION, DO_SAT_INST, TDG_SATURATION, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, REPORT_ID) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{measureLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pressure,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{waterDepth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{waterTemper,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{doInstrument,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{doContent,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dnContent,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{doSaturation,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{dnSaturation,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{do1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{do2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{do3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{titration,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{doSatInst,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{tdgSaturation,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update GSS_FC set SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECTION_NAME = #{sectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONITOR_TIME = #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MEASURE_LINE = #{measureLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRESSURE = #{pressure,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, WATER_DEPTH = #{waterDepth,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, WATER_TEMPER = #{waterTemper,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DO_INSTRUMENT = #{doInstrument,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DO_CONTENT = #{doContent,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DN_CONTENT = #{dnContent,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DO_SATURATION = #{doSaturation,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DN_SATURATION = #{dnSaturation,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DO1 = #{do1,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DO2 = #{do2,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DO3 = #{do3,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TITRATION = #{titration,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, DO_SAT_INST = #{doSatInst,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, TDG_SATURATION = #{tdgSaturation,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORT_ID = #{reportId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SECTION_ID, SECTION_NAME, MONITOR_TIME, MEASURE_LINE, PRESSURE, WATER_DEPTH, WATER_TEMPER, DO_INSTRUMENT, DO_CONTENT, DN_CONTENT, DO_SATURATION, DN_SATURATION, DO1, DO2, DO3, TITRATION, DO_SAT_INST, TDG_SATURATION, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, REPORT_ID from GSS_FC where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, SECTION_ID, SECTION_NAME, MONITOR_TIME, MEASURE_LINE, PRESSURE, WATER_DEPTH, WATER_TEMPER, DO_INSTRUMENT, DO_CONTENT, DN_CONTENT, DO_SATURATION, DN_SATURATION, DO1, DO2, DO3, TITRATION, DO_SAT_INST, TDG_SATURATION, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS, REPORT_ID from GSS_FC

select ID, SECTION_ID, SECTION_NAME, MONITOR_TIME, MEASURE_LINE, PRESSURE, WATER_DEPTH, WATER_TEMPER, DO_INSTRUMENT, DO_CONTENT, DN_CONTENT, DO_SATURATION, DN_SATURATION, DO1, DO2, DO3, TITRATION, DO_SAT_INST, TDG_SATURATION, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS,REPORT_ID from GSS_FC
ORDER BY ID

select ID, SECTION_ID, SECTION_NAME, MONITOR_TIME, MEASURE_LINE, PRESSURE, WATER_DEPTH, WATER_TEMPER, DO_INSTRUMENT, DO_CONTENT, DN_CONTENT, DO_SATURATION, DN_SATURATION, DO1, DO2, DO3, TITRATION, DO_SAT_INST, TDG_SATURATION, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS,REPORT_ID from GSS_FC
ORDER BY ID
